critique: The document appears to be an executive order focused on amending a previous order (Executive Order 13279) concerning faith-based and neighborhood organizations. It aims to ensure these organizations can compete for federal financial assistance without discrimination, while also maintaining separation between explicitly religious activities and federally funded programs. The order emphasizes compliance with the Establishment Clause and Free Exercise Clause of the First Amendment. It also establishes an Interagency Working Group to promote uniformity in agency policies related to these organizations.
